issue.title: Please release packages for different ROS versions

content.raw: Could anyone in the know comment on plans regarding this? Time is running and we have to make some decisions on where to spend it. Especially an answer to the question "Will a hydro version of drcsim be available as .debs?" would be very helpful. Even more helpful would be release date in case of a "yes", but I don´t want to ask too much ;)
